long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bloons Tower Defense 3 is an exciting game that you can now enjoy as a Chrome Extension.
This is a classic tower defense game where you must strategically place various monkey towers to pop all the bloons (balloons) that come in waves. Each tower has unique abilities and upgrades that you can unlock to defend against the increasingly challenging levels. The game features vibrant graphics, a wide variety of monkey towers, and engaging gameplay that will keep you entertained for hours. Bloons Tower Defense 3 is a fan-favorite that you can play for free on the Unblocked Games 6x website at https://unblockedgames6x.org/.
